activities: Church of St. Francis of Assisi
5days.description: If you want to experience the real authentic Goa and delve deep into its history, well then Old Goa is where you need to start your journey. From rustic red stoned relics, white washed churches and beautiful beaches, hop on to your scooter and get ready to zoom off. Start your day off at the Basilica Of Bom Jesus. This gorgeous Goa UNESCO World Heritage Site is indeed a sight to behold. This also holds the remains of St Francis Xavier, a Roman Catholic saint whose body has still not decayed even today.

5days.day: Day 2: Explore North Goa, Its Beaches & Night Life
5days.description: North Goa is that part of Goa that’s most spoken about. From forts to shimmering shorelines, cutesy eateries to beach shacks – North Goa has everything. Start your day by exploring Little Vagator beach and indulging in some water sports...

activities: Get Mesmerised By The Beauty Of Dona Paula

5days.day: Day 5: Chill In Goa Like The Locals
